```{r}

```

## Question 2

```{r}
courses %>%
  arrange(course) %>%  # Tri alphabétique
  rename(
    "course name" = course,
    "identifier" = course_id,
    "module" = module,
    "number of exams" = nb_grades   # colonne réelle de ton fichier
  ) %>%
  kable(caption = "Course description table")
```
